Description: kind of layer into RB or Mobility Servers. Layer ontology describes data domain Reactive Box and other elements of this entity
Unique id of bus  into system
Date of line-service (can be distinct of instant of current event)
Line which the service is working
Number of a bus logic (this is not an idBus)
Next or current stop where bus is passthru
Instant of the current event
Representation of geo-point of current position of event
Next items are for internal use only
Driver id who is working in the service bus
Shift of driver
Part of shift of driver
Status of location of bus
Class or kind of event
Distance in meters from begining of itinerary
Status of the bus service
Frequency on seconds from the bus inmediately before
delay on seconds from the theoretical timetable
Number of trip
Theoretical time of start of trip
Bus active True/False
